title: Episode 264 w/ Swizz Beatz & Timbaland
itunes:title: Episode 264 w/ Swizz Beatz & Timbaland
description:
N.O.R.E. & DJ EFN are the Drink Champs. In this episode, we chop it up with Swizz Beatz & Timbaland!Â 

The legendary producers joined us prior to their VERZUZ match to talk music, life and VERZUZ!

In this episode, we hear stories of Teddy Riley, Aaliyah, Pharrell and the late great DMX and much more!

Swizz & Timbo talk about their friendship over the years and how it would lead to the birth of their VERZUZ platform.Â 

This episode is filled with lots of great hip-hop stories and gems that you donâ€™t want to miss!
